title: Personal Care Home One space available Will not last!
posting_body: ['Personal Care Home located in Riverdale 5 bed 5 bath Rent/Food/Laundry/Toiletries/Furniture/ Cable/Internet/All Inclusive', '*Ensure resident receive their medication on time', '*Support residents who may need assistance moving around', '*Help residents dress, bathe, eat, etc.', '*Assist residents with physical therapy exercises', "*Cook meals according to the resident's restrictions", '*Help residents with their shopping', '*Do necessary housekeeping to maintain a clean environment', '*Provide emotional support as needed', '*Inform physicians or supervisors about uncommon events', '*Act quickly and responsibly in cases of emergency', '*Document services', "Live-in's welcomed."]
